title: [Large-Scale] Design and Application of Self-Regulated Learning Strategies for Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Core engineering principles, practical experience, and understanding of adult learning theories
context.additional_context: A program to strengthen instructional design capabilities for practicing engineering professionals using self-regulated learning strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze metacognition required for engineering curriculum design by applying self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can develop self-regulated learning-based assessment tools reflecting industry demands.
Learners can establish motivation and behavior management strategies for learners by utilizing self-regulated learning processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
